00046 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDEntity : public FCDObjectWithId

00056         ANIMATION_CLIP, 
00057         CAMERA, 
00058         LIGHT,

00074     };

00079

00141     inline void GetHierarchicalAssets(FCDAssetList& assets) { GetHierarchicalAssets(*(FCDAssetConstList*) &assets); }
00142     virtual void GetHierarchicalAssets(FCDAssetConstList& assets) const; 
00148     bool HasNote() const { return !note.empty(); }
00149 
00154     const fstring& GetNote() const { return note; }
00155
